Thematic Research Areas

The particular area of focus is whether openness will provide added insights into the role of science, technology, and innovation (STI) in development practices, with the ultimate goal of strengthening local research capacity and informing policy.

Click a Category To Learn More.

  • MOTIVATIONS - INCENTIVES AND IDEOLOGIES
  • INFRASTRUCTURES & TECHNOLOGIES
  • COMMUNITIES OF PRACTICE IN OPEN AND COLLABORATIVE SCIENCE
  • POTENTIAL IMPACTS (POSITIVE AND NEGATIVE) OF OPEN & COLLABORATIVE SCIENCE
